name: Why Chicken? Why?
description: Which came first? The chicken or the egg? More importantly, why did the chicken cross the road? For the 25 golden eggs of course!!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 10 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 43 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard & Mouse/Partial Controller Support
